"Grinding Weapons and Armor":
"Weapons and armor can be Grinded at the Item Lab to improve their performance.

In addition to N-Meseta and N-Grinders, you will need other weapons and armor to use as material.

“N-グラインダー”は、アイテムコンテナ[緑]で入手できます。"
"Your weapons and armor will gain Grind EXP based on the items used as materials, and if they gain enough, their Grind Level will increase."
